nodes.text: Gi dumpling soup was a Mandalorian-made soup. The dish featured meaty dumplings made from fish—known as gi in the Mandalorian language of Mando'a—as its primary ingredient. Gi dumpling soup was one of several meals served at a cantina in the small town of Enceri on the planet Mandalore.
Gi dumpling soup first appeared in Star Wars canon in the 2008 novel, Order 66: A Republic Commando Novel by author Karen Traviss.
